title: Border Ghost Stories
author: Pease, Howard
snippet: With help of his brothers down the water and a mason from Falstone Sihad run a dry-stone dyke--strengthened with fir tree trunks--round aboutfor the protection of his sheep and nowt in the event of a foray, andwas as pleased with 'the Bower' as Lord William Howard with Naworth.
